snippet: A tour featuring hats from the collection of Theodor Geisel, also known as Dr. Seuss, will begin Monday at the New York Public Library’s Fifth Avenue building.
abstract: Tour featuring hats from personal collection of Theodor Seuss Geisel, also known as Dr Seuss, will open at New York Public Library, Fifth Avenue; show, which highlights role of hats in Geisel's life, is timed to correspond with 75th anniversary of his book The 500 Hats of Bartholomew Cubbins.
lead_paragraph: A tour featuring hats from the collection of Theodor Geisel, also known as Dr. Seuss, will begin Monday at the New York Public Library’s Fifth Avenue building.

headline.seo: Dr. Seuss Himself Was a Cat in the Hat
headline.main: The Author Himself Was a Cat in the Hat
headline.print_headline: The Author Himself Was a Cat in the Hat
